function_call.name: classify_risks_PESTLE
function_call.arguments: {"sorted_risks":[{"name":"Limited effectiveness and safety of disinfection robots and uv systems","category":"Technological risks","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Insufficient hvac standards for diluting indoor air to prevent airborne pathogen transmission in high-occupancy facilities.","category":"Infrastructure risks","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Lack of understanding of occupant behaviors and their impact on disease transmission routes.","category":"Social risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Psychological factors influencing occupant behaviors related to disease transmission.","category":"Social risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Limited understanding of the integrated effects of solutions, such as whether different interventions are additive, multiplicative, or contradictory in their outcomes.","category":"Economic risks","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Insufficient investigation of the cost-effectiveness of various interventions and combinations, including ongoing maintenance costs, energy consumption, and impacts on the fm budget.","category":"Economic risks","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Respiratory virus transmission dynamics influenced by multiple architectural and environmental factors","category":"Environmental risks","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Complexity of evaluating the risk of sars-cov-2 infection in indoor environments","category":"Public health risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Routine disinfection timeframes not being followed for contacted surfaces and items","category":"Public health risks","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Lack of touchless operation technology for common office items and facilities","category":"Economic risks","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Risk of respiratory virus transmission via interior surfaces due to occupant hand-surface contact","category":"Public health risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Airborne virus leakage from the drain due to poorly designed or maintained trap seal retention system.","category":"Infrastructure risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Lack of systematic guidance for drainage system operation and maintenance for infection control.","category":"Infrastructure risks","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Transmission of respiratory viruses via contaminated indoor surfaces.","category":"Public health risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Airborne transmission risk due to traditional hvac systems","category":"Infrastructure risks","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Viral aerosols transmitted via building drainage system","category":"Infrastructure risks","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Ineffectiveness of upper-room uvgi system due to location and operation","category":"Technological risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Decline in upper-room uvgi systems efficiency with rising humidity levels","category":"Technological risks","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Risk of virus transmission through building heating systems","category":"Infrastructure risks","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Inadequate disinfection of indoor surfaces in vast open spaces and shadowed areas such as bedrails and telephones in a ward.","category":"Public health risks","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Concerns regarding occupants’ exposure to uv in upper-room uvgi systems.","category":"Public health risks","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Potential inefficacy of uvgi technology in disinfecting indoor air and surfaces","category":"Technological risks","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Diminished ability of uvgi to disinfect indoor surfaces in the presence of dirt and debris","category":"Technological risks","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Accumulation of pathogenic particles on ioniser and surrounding surfaces due to negative air ionisation","category":"Environmental risks","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Lack of assessment and comparison of infection risk associated with lighting factors that reflect sunlight exposure","category":"Public health risks","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Insufficient assessment of the effectiveness of uvgi systems in mitigating the spread of contagious diseases in healthcare settings","category":"Public health risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Air pressure controls affected by air leaks","category":"Infrastructure risks","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Hazardous waste from filter disposal","category":"Environmental risks","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Reduction of airflow rate caused by filters","category":"Infrastructure risks","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Elevated indoor noise levels from pac operation","category":"Environmental risks","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Ineffective placement of pacs leading to uneven air purification and particle removal in the built environment.","category":"Infrastructure risks","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Ineffective operation and maintenance of hepa filtration systems leading to reduced efficiency in particle removal and air purification.","category":"Infrastructure risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Experimental studies with simulated aerosol particles in various indoor environments","category":"Technological risks","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Mixed effects of combining ventilation and pacs in buildings with central ventilation systems","category":"Infrastructure risks","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Diminished efficiency of pacs as mechanical ventilation in rooms increases","category":"Infrastructure risks","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Inadequate air mixing in rooms with a mixing ventilation system may result in atypical distribution of micro-organisms, increasing infection risk.","category":"Infrastructure risks","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Limited investigation of the effects of hepa filters on ventilation grills and in real-world settings may lead to incomplete understanding of their efficacy in reducing viral transmission.","category":"Technological risks","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Insufficient understanding of virus transmission patterns in various indoor spaces, including restaurants, houses, classrooms, and gyms, may lead to ineffective infection control measures.","category":"Public health risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Natural ventilation may be compromised in cold weather, leading to reduced outdoor airflow.","category":"Environmental risks","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Displacement ventilation promotes vertical stratification and higher ventilation effectiveness but may have mixed cost-effectiveness.","category":"Economic risks","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Co2 concentration as a sole indicator for airborne infection risk","category":"Public health risks","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Ineffectiveness of air flushing in reducing particle concentrations","category":"Technological risks","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Insufficient ventilation rates in high-occupancy buildings leading to increased risk of airborne disease transmission","category":"Infrastructure risks","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Adverse outcomes of increasing ventilation rate, including indoor discomfort, higher energy consumption, and increased co2 emissions","category":"Economic risks","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Significant variations in hvac operation requirements, such as ventilation rates, indicate a research gap.","category":"Infrastructure risks","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"No rules for periodically monitoring indoor air quality in a facility.","category":"Public health risks","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Ventilation alone cannot prevent indoor airborne transmission.","category":"Infrastructure risks","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Lack of understanding of economic, environmental, and social outcomes of interventions related to indoor air quality iaq control in buildings","category":"Economic risks","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Limited exploration of social effects of fm strategies and inconsistent findings","category":"Social risks","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Unwarranted assumptions regarding occupant productivity and work schedules","category":"Social risks","confidence":"High"}]}
